TopicTitle: Visit the You Choose Gaming channel (YCG)! Vote for a video YOU want me to make!

Articles.Content:
Hello there, this is YCG gamer (You Choose Gaming gamer). I am advertising a channel, but not any channel.

My YouTube channel is a one where you can choose what I make for most of my future videos!

My Youtube channel is where all (or at the very least, most) of your comments are read!

If you want me to make KSP comedy videos, and the majority of other voters suggest that, then that's what you will get!

Take a look at my channel trailer:

Now, for the poll:

Poll from PollEv.com:

What type of video for my channel should I make?

(Use a response like: KSP comedy videos)

Text 317200 and your message to 37607

Or:

Tweet @poll 317200 and your message

Answers to this poll are anonymous.

After you take a look at the video, I hope you enjoyed it and will like the future ones i'll make! (I'll make something of my own if the poll doesn't have many people voting).

If the video interests you, subscribe to it and/or like it to show you are interested.

Just tell me if I messed up anything...

Thanks

YCG gamer
